message: Let's start fair, I'll take most of the money but you get a little something to start with.
That's not a fair start, Alice. I'm proposing a more reasonable split.  Let's be practical.
I'm willing to compromise, but let's split it more evenly this time.  I'm confident we can reach a fair deal.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. I'm proposing a 60/40 split.  It's a good deal for both of us, especially considering the time pressure and inflation.
Let's call it even. A 50/50 split is the fairest way to go at this point.  Time is ticking, and we both stand to lose more if we don't agree.
